p19_1: Here is a sample text entry for analysis.
If you use a Mac, make sure to save your csv as a Windows Comma Separated file.
Line 34 can help you find errors in your file.
Punctuation marks such as apostrophes can be problematic in a csv.
Do not use apostrophes if you can help it. Question marks, too.
Oddly enough commas are not a big deal.
